Flub.Name: Formation
Flub.Description: Amount of canyon formations in the terrain.

Flub.Name: Streamline
Flub.Description: The amount of streamlined canyon formation.

Flub.Name: Octaves
Flub.Description: Number of octaves, higher values create more complexity.

Flub.Name: Maximum Depth
Flub.Description: Maximum depth of the canyons created.

Flub.Name: Generate Masks
Flub.Description: Generate optional masks. Disabling this when not using masks will give you a small performance benefit.

Flub.Name: Fast
Flub.Description: Use the Fast Mode to to sacrifice shape quality for speed.

Flub.Name: Seed
Flub.Description: The randomization pattern or seed for the node's process.
